data.text: @SandraNH5 the crazy thing about this is that what she said was 100% true. they knew the effectiveness of both of those medicines and they smeared them as false and silenced anyone for saying otherwise.
@SandraNH5 @HeatherWaetzig Oh no! So ridiculous not to be able to post the truth no matter how inconvenient. I will miss Donna.

@SandraNH5 I reported some dude calling another guy a Russian agent, to the extent of at tweeting russia and Russian intelligence and photos of khadafi beaten after capture, @twitter responded saying no violation. I have no doubt we are a heavily propagandized nation. Worse every day.
@SandraNH5 Oh no poor Donna we'll miss her she's a wonderful friend and truth-seeker. She's still on Facebook if anyone wants to follow her there I'm friends with her.
@SandraNH5 Unbelievable. And Warmongers calling for assassinations are doing fine.

@SandraNH5 Please let us know if she lands somewhere else
Been enjoying her posts since 2016
@SandraNH5 @Jason_Bellenger Take ♥️ Donna, I hope our paths meet again on another platform.
@SandraNH5 You just need a different cell and email address create a new account. Change name a little
@MsCyberDiva @SandraNH5 I hope she gets a GETTR account!
